contents.text: Thank you for calling Beezwax Datatools in the East Bay, your partner in web and database solutions since 1996.
For new project consultations and service inquiries, press 1.
To discuss a new website or web application, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our web development team.

navigationGoals: I need a fast quote and timeline to build a new company website.
I’d like to plan a new website for my veteran support nonprofit to share resources and events.
I’d like to schedule a kickoff call to discuss building a responsive React web app with REST API integration.
Help me plan and start a new website, please.
Discuss creating a web application to visualize my physics simulations.

contents.text: To explore database design, optimization, or data visualization services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our database solutions specialists.

navigationGoals: I’m looking to discuss improving our database architecture for faster reports.
I need to set up a database to manage benefit applications and track case statuses for fellow vets.
I need to architect a scalable PostgreSQL database and set up data visualization dashboards.
I need help designing a database to organize my information.
Set up an optimized database to store and query experimental physics data with built-in visualization.

contents.text: For support with existing projects or troubleshooting, press 2.
For technical support or issue resolution, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Our application is throwing errors in production—please help me resolve them immediately.
My existing web app is showing errors when I upload files—can I get help troubleshooting?
I’m experiencing intermittent 500 errors on my API endpoints and need help debugging.
I’m having trouble with my current project and need technical support.
Troubleshoot errors in my existing physics research website that’s failing to load data.

contents.text: For project updates, billing, or account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to project management and billing.

navigationGoals: I want to review my current project’s progress and settle last month’s invoice.
I want an update on my ongoing project’s progress and to review my latest invoice.
I want an update on my project’s milestones and a breakdown of the latest billing charges.
I’d like an update on my project and have a question about my bill.
Check the status update and invoice details for my ongoing physics simulation web tool project.
